a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Time spent on domestic work, per day, men vs women
Average minutes spent on domestic work per day, by sex (20-74). Estimates come from time use surveys and
include one weekday and one weekend day distributed over the year.
Minutes spent on domestic work - men (20-74)
Minutes spent on domestic work - women (20-74)
Source: European Commission (2004) - How Europeans spend their time - Everyday life of men and women - Data 1998-2002
